description: You are a Member of an Artisan's Guild
backEquip: One Set of Artisan's Tools of your choice
Letter of introduction from your guild
feature: Guild Membership: As an established and well respected member of a guild. You can rely on your fellow guild members to provide you with lodging and food if neccessary (Also pay for your funeral). You can also take advantage of guildhalls of your profession. You must pay 5GP a month for these benefits.
